vision: Deliver a guided onboarding experience that accelerates customer adoption.
problem: New customers need clearer steps to realize value within their first month.
description: This pilot introduces a cross-functional onboarding journey with automated communications and live checkpoints.
scope_in: Design and implement onboarding email sequence
Launch guided setup within the web app
assumptions: Vendors can provision sandbox access within five business days

success_metrics.metric: Percentage of accounts completing onboarding in 30 days
